content: this listing is for an instant download crochet pattern - you will not receive a physical item this crochet pattern will help you to create a penguin christmas ornament **christmas stocking ornament crochet pattern** add an extra dose of cuteness to your christmas tree with this adorable penguin ornament crochet pattern perfect as a charming hanging decoration this delightful little penguin brings a whimsical touch to your holiday décor its sweet design is sure to make you smile and become a favorite among animal lovers and festive decorators alike the crochet pattern is 6 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes stitch marker black embroidery thread **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a white b black c yellow d pink e red total 24 yards **gauge** 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet **finished size** height 10cm x width 7cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet 2dc 2 double_crochet in 1 space increase decrease double_crochet 2 together decrease magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/easy-crochet-penguin-ornament-free-pattern/
